53  #define fmaxf(A,B) std::max(A,B)
54  #define fminf(A,B) std::min(A,B)
55 #endif

57 #if !defined(M_TWOPI)
58  #define M_TWOPI (2 * M_PI)
59 #endif
60 
62 //
63 // This example fills an array of AScalars with the first ten natural numbers
64 // and computes the sum of the array:
65 // \code
66 // AScalar array[10];
67 // PScalar ptr(array);
68 //
69 // for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++)
70 // ptr[i] = AScalar(i + 1, 0);
71 //
72 // AScalar sum = 0;
73 // for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++)
74 // sum += ptr[i];
75 //
76 // printf("%f\n", sum.to_double());
77 // \endcode
78 //
80 
81 struct AScalar
82 {
83  float fr;
84 
85  _AI AScalar() {}
86  _AI AScalar(const AScalar& s) : fr(s.fr) {}
87 
88  _AI AScalar(int32_t i, uint32_t fractional_bits = 0) {
89  fr = i * powf(2, -(float) fractional_bits);
90  }
91  _AI AScalar(uint32_t i, uint32_t fractional_bits) {
92  fr = i * powf(2, -(float) fractional_bits);
93  }
94 
95  _AI AScalar(double d) : fr((float) d) {}
96  _AI AScalar(float f) : fr(f) {}
97 
98  _AI AScalar(const struct ADouble& d);
99 
100 private:
101  // The uint32_t constructor is private to avoid accidentally converting a raw
102  // literal. If the argument is a compile-time constant use CONST_ASCALAR(),
103  // otherwise convert it to an int32_t or use the two-argument constructor.
104 
105  _AI AScalar(uint32_t i) : fr((float) i) {}
106 public:
107 
108  _AI int to_int(uint32_t fractional_bits = 0) const {
109  float x = fr * powf(2, (float) fractional_bits);
110  return (int) ((x >= 0) ? floorf(x + 0.5f) : ceilf(x - 0.5f));
111  }
112  _AI int floor() const {return (int) floorf(fr);}
113  _AI int ceil() const {return (int) ceilf(fr);}
114 
115  _AI struct AComplex operator* (const struct AComplex& x) const;
116  _AI struct AQuaternion operator* (const struct AQuaternion& x) const;
117  _AI struct AQuad operator* (const struct AQuad& x) const;
118  _AI struct ATriple operator* (const struct ATriple& x) const;
119  _AI struct APair operator* (const struct APair& x) const;
120  _AI struct AComplexPair operator* (const struct AComplexPair& x) const;
121 
122  _AI AScalar operator* (const AScalar& x) const {return fr * x.fr;}
123  _AI AScalar operator+ (const AScalar& x) const {return fr + x.fr;}
124  _AI AScalar operator- (const AScalar& x) const {return fr - x.fr;}
125  _AI AScalar operator- () const {return -fr;}
126  _AI AScalar operator/ (const AScalar& x) const {return fr / x.fr;}
127 
128  _AI AScalar& operator*= (const AScalar& x) {return (*this = *this * x);}
129  _AI AScalar& operator/= (const AScalar& x) {return (*this = *this / x);}
130  _AI AScalar& operator+= (const AScalar& x) {return (*this = *this + x);}
131  _AI AScalar& operator-= (const AScalar& x) {return (*this = *this - x);}
132 
133  _AI bool operator== (const AScalar& x) const {return fr == x.fr;}
134  _AI bool operator>= (const AScalar& x) const {return fr >= x.fr;}
135  _AI bool operator> (const AScalar& x) const {return fr > x.fr;}
136  _AI bool operator<= (const AScalar& x) const {return fr <= x.fr;}
137  _AI bool operator< (const AScalar& x) const {return fr < x.fr;}
138  _AI bool operator!= (const AScalar& x) const {return fr != x.fr;}
139 
140  _AI AScalar operator<< (int x) const {return fr * powf(2, (float) x);}
141  _AI AScalar operator>> (int x) const {return fr * powf(2, (float)-x);}
142 
143  _AI AScalar& operator<<= (int x) {fr = fr * powf(2, (float) x); return *this;}
144  _AI AScalar& operator>>= (int x) {fr = fr * powf(2, (float)-x); return *this;}
145 
146  _AI AScalar inverse() const {return 1.0 / fr;}
147 
148  _AI AScalar mul_add(const AScalar& x, const AScalar& y) const {
149  return fr + x.fr * y.fr;
150  }
151  _AI AScalar mul_sub(const AScalar& x, const AScalar& y) const {
152  return fr - x.fr * y.fr;
153  }
154  _AI AScalar& mul_acc(const AScalar& x, const AScalar& y) {
155  fr += x.fr * y.fr;
156  return *this;
157  }
158 
159  _AI AScalar f_max(const AScalar& x) const {
160  return fmaxf(fr, x.fr);
161  }
162 
163  _AI AScalar f_min(const AScalar& x) const {
164  return fminf(fr, x.fr);
165  }
166 
167  _AI AScalar f_clamp(const AScalar& low, const AScalar& high) const {
168  return f_max(low).f_min(high);
169  }
170 
171  _AI AScalar abs() const {return fabsf(fr);}
172  _AI AScalar f_inv() const {return 1.0 / fr;}
173  _AI AScalar f_invsqrt() const {return 1.0 / sqrtf(fr);}
174  _AI AScalar f_sigmoid() const {return fr < 0 ? powf(2.0, fr - 1)
175  : 1 - powf(2.0, -fr - 1);}
176  _AI AScalar f_log2() const {return logf(fr) / M_LN2;}
177  _AI AScalar f_pow2() const {return powf(2.0, fr);}
178  _AI AScalar f_sqrt() const {return sqrtf(fr);}
179 
180  _AI AScalar sine_turns() const {return sinf(fr * (float) M_TWOPI);}
181  _AI AScalar cosine_turns() const {return cosf(fr * (float) M_TWOPI);}
182 
183  _AI AScalar sine_rads() const {return sinf(fr);}
184  _AI AScalar cosine_rads() const {return cosf(fr);}
185 
186  _AI AScalar f_pow(const AScalar& power) const {return powf(fr, power.fr);}
187 
188  _AI static AScalar atan2_turns(const AScalar& y, const AScalar& x) {
189  return atan2f(y.fr, x.fr) / M_TWOPI;
190  }
191 
192  _AI static AScalar atan2_rads(const AScalar& y, const AScalar& x) {
193  return atan2f(y.fr, x.fr);
194  }
195 
196  _AI AScalar arcsine_turns() const {return asinf(fr) / M_TWOPI;}
197  _AI AScalar arcsine_rads() const {return asinf(fr);}
198 
199  _AI AScalar f_exp() const {return expf(fr);}
200  _AI AScalar f_log() const {return logf(fr);}
201 
202  _AI static AScalar MinusOne() {return -1.0;}
203  _AI static AScalar Zero() {return 0.0;}
204  _AI static AScalar One() {return 1.0;}
205  _AI static AScalar Two() {return 2.0;}
206  _AI static AScalar Three() {return 3.0;}
207  _AI static AScalar Ten() {return 10.0;}
208  _AI static AScalar Twenty() {return 20.0;}
209  _AI static AScalar Half() {return 0.5;}
210  _AI static AScalar Sqrt2() {return M_SQRT2;}
211  _AI static AScalar HalfSqrt2() {return M_SQRT1_2;}
212  _AI static AScalar Pi() {return M_PI;}
213  _AI static AScalar TwoPi() {return M_TWOPI;}
214  _AI static AScalar HalfPi() {return M_PI_2;}
215  _AI static AScalar E() {return M_E;}
216  _AI static AScalar HalfE() {return M_E / 2;}
217  _AI static AScalar log2ten() {return M_LN10 / M_LN2;}
218  _AI static AScalar log10two() {return M_LN2 / M_LN10;}
219  _AI static AScalar log2e() {return M_LOG2E;}
220  _AI static AScalar ln2() {return M_LN2;}
221  _AI static AScalar MaxAFloat() {return 4294967040.0;}
222  _AI static AScalar MinAFloat() {return -4294967040.0;}
223 
224  // For debugging:
225 
226  _AI float to_float() const {return fr;}
227  _AI double to_double() const {return fr;}
228 
229  _AI uint32_t raw() const {
230  int i;
231  memcpy(&i, &fr, 4);
232  return i;
233  }
234  _AI uint32_t raw_float() const {return raw();}
235  _AI uint32_t raw_afloat() const {
236  int a;
237  memcpy(&a, &fr, 4);
238  int sign = a & 0x80000000;
239  int exp = a & 0x7f800000;
240  int mant = a & 0x007fffff;
241 
242  exp = exp - (95 << 23);
243  if (exp > 0x1f800000)
244  return sign | 0x7fffffff;
245  if (exp < 0)
246  return 0;
247 
248  return sign | ((exp | mant) << 2);
249  }
250 };
251 
252 //
253 // Pointer to AScalar
254 //
255 
256 struct PScalar
257 {
258  float* ptr;
259 
260  _AI PScalar(void* p) : ptr((float*) p) {}
261 
262  _AI operator AScalar*() const {return (AScalar*) ptr;}
263  _AI AScalar* operator->() const {return (AScalar*) ptr;}
264  _AI AScalar& operator[] (int i) const {return ((AScalar*) ptr)[i];}
265 
266  _AI PScalar operator+ (int index) const {return PScalar(ptr + index);}
267  _AI PScalar operator- (int index) const {return PScalar(ptr - index);}
268 
269  _AI PScalar& operator+= (int index) {ptr += index; return *this;}
270  _AI PScalar& operator-= (int index) {ptr -= index; return *this;}
271 
272  _AI PScalar& operator++ () {++ptr; return *this;}
273  _AI PScalar& operator-- () {--ptr; return *this;}
274  _AI PScalar operator++ (int) {PScalar p(*this); ++ptr; return p;}
275  _AI PScalar operator-- (int) {PScalar p(*this); --ptr; return p;}
276 };
277 
278 struct PConstScalar
279 {
280  const float* ptr;
281 
282  _AI PConstScalar(const void* p) : ptr((const float*) p) {}
283 
284  _AI operator const AScalar*() const {return (const AScalar*) ptr;}
285  _AI const AScalar* operator->() const {return (const AScalar*) ptr;}
286  _AI const AScalar& operator[] (int i) const {return ((const AScalar*) ptr)[i];}
287 
288  _AI PConstScalar operator+ (int index) const {return PConstScalar(ptr + index);}
289  _AI PConstScalar operator- (int index) const {return PConstScalar(ptr - index);}
290 
291  _AI PConstScalar& operator+= (int index) {ptr += index; return *this;}
292  _AI PConstScalar& operator-= (int index) {ptr -= index; return *this;}
293 
294  _AI PConstScalar& operator++ () {++ptr; return *this;}
295  _AI PConstScalar& operator-- () {--ptr; return *this;}
296  _AI PConstScalar operator++ (int) {PConstScalar p(*this); ++ptr; return p;}
297  _AI PConstScalar operator-- (int) {PConstScalar p(*this); --ptr; return p;}
298 };
